title: SEPTEMBER 11 THE NEW PEARL HARBOR PTS 1,2,3
description:
SEPTEMBER 11  THE NEW PEARL HARBOR
  A FILM BY MASSIMO MAZZUCCO 

September 11 the New Pearl Harbor is a 5 hour documentary that summarizes 12 years of public debate on 9/11.

All the most important issues in the debate are presented in full detail, showing both the positions of those who regect the official version, the 9/11 Truth Movement, and the positions of those who support it, called "the debunkers."

You can be the judge.

DISC 1

INTRODUCTION
12 parallels between Pearl Harbor and Semtember 11

PART 1 - AIR DEFENSE
Where are the interceptors?
The "incompetence theory"
The military drills
Specific warnings
The chain of command
Promotions, not punishments
The Mineta case

PART 2 - THE HIJACKERS
Piss-poor pilots
Did someone know?
Airport security cameras
The black boxes

PART 3 - THE AIRPLANES
Passenger jets or military drones?
What happened to the passengers?
The cell phone calls

DISC 2

PART 4 - THE PENTAGON
The missing airplane
The mystery hole
The missing tapes
Pentagon video analysis

PART 5 - FLIGHT 93
Plane crash or bomb explosion?
The debris field
The shootout hypothesis
The small white jet
Lets roll

PART 6 - WORLD TRADE CENTER
The towers' little dirty secret
Larry Silverstein
Nist vs. Architects & Engineers
Fragile or robust buildings?
The initial collapse
The complete collapse
Laws of physics violated
Freefall
The debunkers' response

DISC 3

Explosions
Squibs
Explosive force
Ejecta
Diagonal cuts
Extreme temperatures
Bent and mangled beams
Molten steel
Molten concrete
Pulverization
Vaporized victims
Conclusion

PART 7 - BUILDING SEVEN
The official version
The collapse simulation
The fire simulation
Pre-knowledge
Symmetry
Freefall

EPILOGUE
John McCain
The last word

Written and Directed by MASSIMO MAZZUCCO
Narration: Joseph Culp
Music: FEDERICO POVOLERI
Artwork: ROBERTO LI CAUSI
DVD - STEREO - NTSC
Total Running Time: 5 Hours
Distribution: LUOGOCOMUNE.NET
